statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE last_name ='Smith';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customer_data WHERE first_name ='John' AND last_name ='Doe';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, gender FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name AS customer_name, category AS product_category FROM customers c JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customers.name, products.name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(history_id) AS purchase_count FROM shopping_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, sh.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN shopping_history sh ON c.customer_id = sh.customer_id JOIN products p ON sh.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sh.quantity > 2;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) AS month FROM orders GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) ORDER BY month;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, p.product_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN orders o ON t.order_id = o.order_id JOIN products p ON t.amount > 100 AND p.product_id = o.order_id;
SELECT c.first_name, o.total_amount, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > o.total_amount;
